name: Star Ascent
description:
Star Ascent is about Sammy the Star, trying to get back up into the sky. Use clouds and upgrades to gradually help Sam jump higher and faster, until eventually he reaches his goal! See how fast you can reach the end of the game and compete against your friends! Perfect game for any age!

This itch.io URL will be the main distribution site for the game once crowdfunding on kickstarter has completed. You can head over here to see the progress:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/419041292/star-ascent
